<br>
<br>

#### Interaction between Kable and Mongo database sentinel

<br>
<br>

## How to use

Download the example [or clone the repo](https://github.com/11ume/kable):

within each folder sentinel and service, run:

```bash
npm install
npm run start
```

<br>

```bash
curl http://localhost:3000
```
